! cue fmt ./fmt
cmp stderr expect-stderr

cd issue_1544
cp if.cue if.cue.golden
cp let.cue let.cue.golden
cp for.cue for.cue.golden
cue fmt .
cmp if.cue if.cue.golden
cmp let.cue let.cue.golden
cmp for.cue for.cue.golden
cd ..

-- expect-stderr --
expected 'STRING', found '.':
    ./fmt/error.cue:1:9
-- fmt/error.cue --
import a.b "foo"

a: 2
bb: 3
-- fmt/cue.mod --
-- issue_1544/if.cue --
if true {
	x: 5
}
-- issue_1544/let.cue --
let x = 5
y: x
-- issue_1544/for.cue --
for v in ["a", "b"] {
	(v): v
}
